SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.recipe

接口 ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder

封闭接口:
ArtisanShapedRecipe
public static interface ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder
Shaped recipe builder interface with fluent API design.

Usage guidelines:

  1. Must call key(NamespacedKey) to set the unique recipe namespace key
  2. Must call set(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to define the pattern
  3. Must call add(char, Choice) to bind ingredients
  4. Must call resultGenerator(ItemGenerator) to set the result generator
  5. Must call build() to complete construction

    Binds a character to an ingredient choice.

    Builds an immutable shaped recipe instance.

    key(@NotNull NamespacedKey key)
    Sets the recipe identifier.
    @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder
    resultGenerator(@NotNull ItemGenerator resultGenerator)
    Sets the result item generator.
    @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder
    set(@NotNull String line1)
    Sets the single-line recipe pattern (second and third lines are empty).
    @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder
    set(@NotNull String line1, @NotNull String line2)
    Sets the two-line recipe pattern (third line is empty).
    @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder
    set(@NotNull String line1, @NotNull String line2, @NotNull String line3)
    Sets the three-line recipe pattern.

  • 方法详细资料

    • key

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder key(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey key)
      Sets the recipe identifier.
      参数:
      key - The namespace key for this recipe (must not be null)
      返回:
      This builder instance (for chaining)
      另请参阅:
      • Naming conventions

    • set

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder set(@NotNull @NotNull String line1, @NotNull @NotNull String line2, @NotNull @NotNull String line3)
      Sets the three-line recipe pattern.
      参数:
      line1 - First line pattern (must not be null, length must be 3)
      line2 - Second line pattern (must not be null, length must be 3)
      line3 - Third line pattern (must not be null, length must be 3)
      返回:
      This builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If line lengths are invalid or contain undefined characters

    • set

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder set(@NotNull @NotNull String line1, @NotNull @NotNull String line2)
      Sets the two-line recipe pattern (third line is empty).
      参数:
      line1 - First line pattern (must not be null)
      line2 - Second line pattern (must not be null)
      返回:
      This builder instance

    • set

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder set(@NotNull @NotNull String line1)
      Sets the single-line recipe pattern (second and third lines are empty).
      参数:
      line1 - First line pattern (must not be null)
      返回:
      This builder instance

    • add

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder add(char c, @NotNull @NotNull Choice choice)
      Binds a character to an ingredient choice.
      参数:
      c - The placeholder character in the pattern
      choice - The corresponding ingredient choice
      返回:
      This builder instance

    • resultGenerator

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe.Builder resultGenerator(@NotNull @NotNull ItemGenerator resultGenerator)
      Sets the result item generator.
      参数:
      resultGenerator - The result generator (must not be null)
      返回:
      This builder instance
      另请参阅:
      • Generator interface

    • build

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanShapedRecipe build()
      Builds an immutable shaped recipe instance.
      返回:
      The configured recipe instance
      抛出:
      IllegalCallerException - If required parameters are missing
